data.text: @KarinMary1 WOW I have never known anyone to have had a bluetooth alert thats really cool, but scary!

@ngatikotimana Recently, on a Sunday I stopped off to say hello to a neighbour who was working in his garden. On Thursday that week I had notification via blue tooth I was a close contact. On Friday I found he was +ve.
Hell yeah. Mine looks like that!

@bea_green @ngatikotimana I sometimes look at my phone and think oh my god I’ve not scanned for 3 days. Then I realise I haven’t left the house and promptly add the I stayed home entries. I try to remember every day but when you don’t leave the house it ain’t so much of a thing.
@bea_green @Larissacomments We have a qr at home lol

@Larissacomments @ngatikotimana I keep forgetting to do the “I stayed home” entries.  I wonder if I should put a QR code on my bedroom door 😂. 

(Luckily, now I am no longer isolating due to a cold I can resume my daily trip to the cafe for a takeaway FW 🎉 and so I am back to getting a daily scan).
@Larissacomments Same mate. So many have just given up
